policy_rules.title: GP Visits Coverage
policy_rules.description: 50% cover up to €30 per visit. Maximum 10 GP visits per policy year. No referral required. Direct reimbursement available. Prescription charges not covered.
policy_rules.claim_process: Submit receipts via app or member area within 12 months

policy_rules.title: Consultant Out-patient Visits
policy_rules.description: 50% refund of costs. GP referral letter required (valid for 6 months). Must be from a registered consultant. Subject to €500 annual out-patient cap.

policy_rules.title: MRI/CT Diagnostic Scans
policy_rules.description: Full cover in participating centers with Direct Settlement. GP or Consultant referral required. Clinical indicators must be met. Beacon Hospital included.

policy_rules.title: Physiotherapy Sessions
policy_rules.description: 50% refund of costs. Therapist must be registered with Irish Society of Chartered Physiotherapists or CORU. Subject to €500 annual out-patient cap. No referral required for initial assessment.

policy_rules.title: Day-case Hospital Treatment
policy_rules.description: Full cover in public and private hospitals. €50 excess for private day-case. Direct settlement available. Consultant fees fully covered if using participating consultant.
rejection_reasons: Treatment could have been done as out-patient
No prior authorization for hi-tech hospitals

policy_rules.title: Receipt Submission Rules
policy_rules.description: All receipts must be submitted within 12 months from end of policy year. Must be on stamped or headed paper. Must show: Date, Provider name, Treatment type, Cost, Patient name.

policy_rules.title: Waiting Periods for New Members
policy_rules.description: Accident/injury: Immediate cover. New illness after membership: 26 weeks. Pre-existing conditions: 5 years. Maternity: 12 months (under 55).

policy_rules.title: Pre-existing Condition Definition
policy_rules.description: An ailment where signs/symptoms existed in 6 months before: (a) first health insurance, (b) rejoining after 13+ week gap, (c) upgrading to higher cover. Medical advisors determine pre-existing status.
rejection_reasons: Condition existed within 6 months of joining
Treatment for same condition in last 6 months

policy_rules.title: Annual Out-patient Expense Cap
policy_rules.description: €500 maximum refund per member per year for everyday medical expenses. €1 annual excess applies first. Some benefits exempt (maternity, cancer, child healthcare).

policy_rules.title: Clinical Indicators for Procedures
policy_rules.description: Certain procedures require clinical indicators from GP/Consultant to justify medical necessity. Must match Schedule of Benefits. Examples: MRI (neurological symptoms), Orthopedic surgery (failed conservative treatment).
rejection_reasons: Indicators do not match Schedule of Benefits
